meanings.definition: The strip of grass between the sidewalk and the street where trees are often planted.
meanings.sent1: The treelawn in front of our house has beautiful maple trees.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to water the treelawn to keep the trees healthy.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels on the treelawn seem to have a secret meeting every afternoon.
meanings.sent4: The treelawn is like a green ribbon separating the sidewalk from the road.
meanings.sent5: Children love playing under the shade of the trees on the treelawn.
